**Solution**:

The residuals are calculated as **e** = **y ** - $\mathbb{X}$**b** where $\vec{y}$ be the column vector of average prices $(y_1, \dots, y_{52})$, $\vec{b}$ be the column vector $(b_1, b_2)$ where $b_1$ and $b_2$ are the estimated coefficients from the linear model, and 
\[
\mat{X} = \begin{bmatrix}
x_1 & 1 \\
\vdots & \vdots \\
x_{52} & 1
\end{bmatrix}
\]

is the design matrix.
